comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Ramon Barros Luco (1835-1919), president of Chile: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ram%C3%B3n_Barros_Luco

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Barros Luco is remembered for his fond enjoyment of the cheesesteak sandwich, a meal on which he dined often; the Chilean version, "the Barros Luco sandwich," is still called by his name.

In 1914, Chile was enlarging its ports in anticipation of greatly increased trade, that would be facilitated by opening of the Panama Canal.
